body.name: Mini Projector with 5G WiFi and Bluetooth, HIPPUS Portable Projector 1080P Supported 120ANSI, Bluetooth Movie Projector for Bedroom/Outdoor, Compatible with iOS/Android/Laptop/TV Stick/HDMI/PS5
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs
features: 【120 ANSI & 1080P Supported & 720P Native】HIPPUS projection adopts the latest upgraded technology, with a palm-sized size that has a native resolution of 1280 x 720, and can support up to 1080P high-definition screen playback. The overall brightness is twice that of ordinary products, and with a brightness of 120ANSI, you can enjoy the big screen even in a room that is not completely dark, protecting your eyes.

【2.4G+5G WIFI Wireless Screen Mirroring】HIPPUS WiFi projector supports 2.4G+5G WiFi connection and is designed to be compatible with Android/iPhone/Windows 10. Wireless transmission and screen mirroring require no additional conversion cables. You can connect your device to the projector at any time to enjoy the fun of big-screen life.

【Bluetooth Projector】The projector's built-in speakers. Supports connecting various Bluetooth devices to adjust the volume according to the projection environment design. The connection and use of various Bluetooth speakers can help you immerse yourself in the big-screen fun brought by the projector. Please note that Bluetooth connectivity for screen playback is not supported.

【Mini Portable Projector with 200"】The projector measures 6.2*4.7*2.4 inches and weighs only 1.1 pounds. The maximum supported projection screen is up to 200 inches. Palm-sized and easy to carry, you can easily put it in your pocket or bag to enjoy the big screen anytime and anywhere.

【Multiple Connections and Scenario Use】Multiple input source interfaces to meet your diverse device needs: HDMI, AV, USB, and 3.5mm audio output jacks. Compatible with PC, Fire Stick, and PS5 multi-device connections, a one-click connection easily meets your daily needs! The projector can be used in Halloween events and other scenes. It is small and exquisite and can also be a holiday gift.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 48 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HIPPUS-Mini Portable Home Projector Designed for beginners, a full-featured, easy-to-operate projector！ Bright and Clear The HIPPUS home projector adopts LCD technology, and the screen brightness can reach 8500LM, which can realize authentic 720P high-definition images. (recommended for higher image quality in darker environments) The projector supports playing 1080P movies, and the HDMI cable supports watching 4K videos. Wireless connections [High-Speed 5G & 2.4G WiFi Connection]Equipped with ultra-high-speed 5G WiFi function, it can instantly connect IOS, Windows, and Android devices wirelessly. [Equipped with Bluetooth 5.2]Wirelessly connect Bluetooth speakers and headphones for an immersive viewing experience. Wired Connections (USB & HDMI & Headphones & AV) The HIPPUS small projector has HDMI, AV, USB ports, you can choose the input signal directly compatible with the device and easily connect Fire Stick, Chromecast, PC, external speakers, Switch, TV box, DVD player, PS5, USB storage. Super mini size: 6.2*4.7*2.4in,1LB. Notebook size is easy to carry

5G WiFi Projector-Mobile phone/Tablet/Laptop-WiFi wireless projection iOS device First, connect the projector to your home network.Select "Screen Mirroring" in the signal source to enter the "iOS Screen Mirroring" interface.Connect your iOS device to the same Wi-Fi router.Select the projector from the search results. Android device First, make sure your Android device has a wireless projection function.(If you want to use screen mirroring, you need the wireless projection function. Some old phones, Samsung A series, and Google phones do not support it. Please note.)Select "Screen Mirroring" in the signal source to enter the "Android Screen Mirroring" interface.Connect your Android device to the same Wi-Fi router.Select the projector from the search results. NOTE: Due to copyright protection, paid video distribution services such as Netflix, Primevideo, and Hulu cannot project directly from your smartphone. Try connecting the PC/TV Box/Fire Stick with an HDMI cable. If you have any questions, Projector product page → Click the seller "Gulebe" → Click "Question" to chat.

Bluetooth Projector-Equipped with Bluetooth 5.2- Immersive experience! HIPPUS Bluetooth projector is equipped with advanced Bluetooth 5.2 technology, which can seamlessly connect with Bluetooth speakers, earphones, and other devices within 5 meters.With the Bluetooth function, you can easily pair the projector with other Bluetooth devices without worrying about cumbersome wired connections. This makes home entertainment more convenient and allows you to enjoy a high-quality audio experience at all times.Support connecting Bluetooth speakers to amplify the sound, and support connecting Bluetooth headsets for immersive viewing.Notes 1. Before connecting the projector, please make sure the Bluetooth audio is not connected to other devices. Because Bluetooth audio generally only connects to one device at a time. 2. The Bluetooth function of the projector only supports audio transmission with audio equipment and does not support video synchronization with smartphones or computers.

A small projector reflects the big world! Mini Size: 6.2*4.7*2.4inUltra-light: 1LB Palm-sized, compact in shape, easy to store and carry, and can be placed in a small space, so you can use the projector anytime and anywhere, such as on business trips, travel, gatherings with friends, etc. Projection Screens: 22” to 200”Projection distance: 3.6ft to 16.4ft The screen aspect ratio supports 4:3 and 16:9 adjustments, which can be adapted to horizontal screen movie mode and vertical screen mobile phone mode. The projector projects at a distance of 3.6 ft, and the screen can reach 50 inches, which is the best display effect at present. Support full 1080P, the image is clear and delicate, and you can enjoy the atmosphere of a movie theater even in a close-up and small room!

Wide compatibility Meet various projection needs Equipped with HDMI, AV, USB, and other ports, it is compatible with Fire Stick, Chromecast, PC, TV, game console, Blu-ray DVD, and other devices to meet your diverse projection needs. Rich accessories Contains a small home projector body, power cord, HDMI and AV cables, remote control (batteries not included), instruction manual, and quick guide.

Work with TV Stick Connection method: Insert the TV stick into the HDMI port of the projector to enter the HDMI signal screen of the projector, which is easy to use.With a TV stick, you can watch all copyrighted videos! Watch unlimited channels and movies like Netflix, Primevideo, Hulu.

Multi-scenario application At Home - Home Projector (Movie Watching/Sports)Outdoor Use - Outdoor Projector (Party/Camping)Hobby Use - Art Projector (hand painting/sewing)Quickly start your entertainment big screen life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smart view & AirPlay
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I needed something for work and travel. This projector is small which makes it perfect. I like the packaging which makes it great to use the same box when traveling. It is very lightweight. I love the look of it as well. I can easily place it anywhere.I like the option to airplay and smart view options. In the video I used an a54 android phone. I really needed something I could use without home internet. So using the smart view with my phone makes it a WiFi to WiFi connection with the device. For AirPlay I need to have the internet and WiFi. However the hdmi allows me to use my iPhone 14.I would say it is a great little useful gadget and aesthetically pleasing. It fulfills my needs. Image quality is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: Whether you're creating a cozy bedroom movie night or enjoying the great outdoors, the 120 ANSI lumens ensure a vibrant and clear display. The Bluetooth feature adds versatility, allowing you to connect your favorite devices seamlessly.Compatible with iOS, Android, laptops, TV sticks, HDMI devices, and even your PS5, this projector is a versatile companion for all your entertainment needs. The convenience of wireless connectivity and the broad compatibility make it a go-to choice for various setups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great picture and features but Missing Keystone Correction
reviews.reviewText: This little projector has a great picture. The scaling feature will let you get a 16 x 9 picture down to 3' wide at 50% about 4' from your screen or wall. The picture is bright and readable, the Wi-fi feature is very neat, audio lag is minimal and the whole thing will fit in your hand. They issue is there is no keystone correction, the box says auto-keystone correction but after contacting the Mfg I was told they did not offer that feature on this model because it is so small. The auto focus feature was not useful, I used the manual focus and was able to get a clear picture. If you could place the projector at a height that is at the center of your screen you could get by without Keystone correction but that means it has to be in the viewing area and you would need a fairly tall stand. I really wanted to love this little projector, if it had keystone correction is would be awesome but without it, use is very limited.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use great little projector.
reviews.reviewText: This projector is easy to use it’s rather small which isn’t a big deal we just use it in our bedroom on movie nights or the kids use it during their sleep overs. It’s easy to navigate through, the settings are simple and self-explanatory, we hook up Bluetooth speaker up to it to get better audio than what comes out of the projector unit other than that it’s a great buy highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great (in the dark...)
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. For an affordable, portable projector I am quite pleased with the HIPPUS. I've been running it off of HDMI, connected to a secondary computer and, on the whole, the experience has been great. However, In my brief attempts at testing, was unsuccessful at screen-mirroring an Amazon Fire tablet. The tablet recognized the projector, but failed to connect.My main criticism with the unit is that it runs a little hot and loud, so it's not something you want to be sitting directly beside. With headphones on, it wasn't too obnoxious, but without it can be a little distracting.The projector is fairly compact and lightweight, though likely not best-in-class in either regard. Build quality is nice, and has all the basic features you will need to get projecting. That said, I'm not a huge fan of the focus adjuster. I can't help but feel you would get a lot better fine-tune adjustment from a traditional ring, rather than the lever which is entirely too easy to bump out of focus while messing with the device.Picture quality in a dark room was good, given I was looking at simulated 1080p on 720p native resolution (though it did take a bit of fiddling with the picture settings, as none of the default options looked particularly good to me.) As you can see in with my pictures, though... excess light in the room can dull it out pretty quickly.For you gamers out there, input lag was surprisingly minimal, so unless you are trying to play a super twitchy, hyper-competitive shooter, I think you'll be just as pleased with this for gaming as you will be for movie watching.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not compatible woth android or tablet
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't able to make it work with my galaxy phone nor my tablet. I had to connect it to my laptop. Also wasnt satisfied with the screen quality. You have to be in a very dark room or area in order to see projection. Also i had to use a speaker because the sound is not loud enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an excellent small projector with a lot of output.
reviews.reviewText: This projector may be small but it gives a great quality picture and is very well made. I love how compact and portable it is. I love the accessibility to be able to connect with all kinds of devices also it's Bluetooth capable. I absolutely love this little projector. This would make an excellent gift and any family or even a gamer would love it.#FoundItOnAmazon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of connectivity, great picture quality, low brightness
reviews.reviewText: This little projector packs a lot of features in a small package. It's basically an Android smart display, similar to Android TV, but allows you to connect virtually anything. The picture quality is great for 1080p and the refresh rate is acceptable, even good. It won't replace a large stationary projector, but for something to use on the go at a meeting, presentation, or an outdoor event at night in your backyard? Yeah, not bad.It's about the size of a really thick book and weighs about a pound, so easy to carry for sure. The small size means it gets hot and the fan goes full blast when you're using it. There's no away around that, unfortunately, with this kind of technology. It's a projector, projectors get hot. The brightness is also subpar, not bad, but daylight viewing is going to be poor. Still, even with its downsides, it's a pretty good projector and costs quite a bit less than comparable options.

reviews.reviewTitle: サウンドは別途ブルートゥース接続がおすすめです。
reviews.reviewText: プロジェクター入門機としてはよいと思います。画面サイズは本体の位置を前後させて決め、次にフォーカスをあわせます。いちおう台形自動補正機能もありますが、手動でやったほうが思い通りになります。ファンの音はやや気になるもののプロジェクターにはつきものです。スピーカーが非力なのでブルートゥースで別のスピカーから音を出す方がよいです。平たいタイプ（8500LM)、円筒タイプ（12000LM)と同社の別の製品が同じページに掲載されていたので、レビューが同一商品で重複していると判断されたためか、未承認となりました。
雰囲気で使うなら問題なし！細かいことが気になる方は良いものを！
かなり明るく投影出来てます♪サイズ的には50インチ位でしたがこのクラスなら価格的にも優秀でしょう♪スマホをそのまま投影出来るのは最高です。遊びでも仕事でも良い使い方が出来るでしょう♪

reviews.reviewTitle: コンセントに繋がれているので…
reviews.reviewText: 小型のプロジェクターです。収納場所には困りませんが、どこまで小さくなっても家庭用コンセントが必要という点があるので、どこでも使えるような手軽さが得られるわけではありません。無線通信もしっかり安定しています。スマホのゲームや動画をミラーリングする事で大画面を楽しんだり、定番の天井投影で寝る前のひと時に映画を楽しんだり。用途は色々ですね。

reviews.reviewTitle: 小さいので、旅先で使うのにもよい
reviews.reviewText: 思っていたのよりも小さくてびっくり。イベントで使うために注文したのですが、このサイズなら旅先にも持っていけるなと思いました。自宅では、天井に映像を映してそのまま寝落ちしたりと、楽しく使わせてもらっています。十分小さくて軽いので、カメラ用の小さな三脚にのせても問題ありませんでした。ライトの明るさがサイズ相応なので、明るい場所での使用は適していません。部屋でカーテンを閉めて使う分には十分な明るさです。それと、ピントあわせが手動で、台形補正ができない（難しい？）ので、スクリーンと真正面に投影できる場所が必要です。
